translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辺りの景色が変わることに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the change of the scenery around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神ALICEはどこか顔色を変える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goddess ALICE's complexion changed somewhat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは人間で言うなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If speaking in human terms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恍惚に最も近い表情だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was an expression closest to ecstasy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神ALICEの目の前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the eyes of goddess ALICE,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その『存在』が天より――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That 'being' appeared from the heavens—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: または地より姿を現す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or from the earth.
"...Goddess"
"Speak—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、女性のものらしき声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That voice, seemingly feminine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに人間とは格が違った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was on a completely different level from that of humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神ALICEのそれがひれ伏さざるを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the goddess ALICE's own voice held power that compelled one to bow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得ない力があるとするならば、その声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then that voice was such that even having its existence before one's eyes was forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己が存在を眼前に置くことすら憚られた。
声がかかり、ようやく女神ALICEは顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When spoken to, goddess ALICE finally raised her face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧の通りでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you see before you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回の戦乱のただ中にいた魂の所有者は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The owners of the souls caught in the midst of this war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆こうして私に挑み、その命を散らせました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all challenged me thus, scattering their lives."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神々しい声の主は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The master of that divine voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか楽しそうな気配を発する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exuded an air of amusement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人なる生き物は数多き種、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans are many species,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故に奇矯なる者らも多い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and therefore many eccentric ones among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方らの美点よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is their virtue."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……仰る通りかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... I believe you are correct..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女神よ、大義であった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Goddess, it was righteous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「此度の一件、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regarding this incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのお方も非常に満足されておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that entity is also very satisfied."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……ありがとうございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... thank you very much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「されど、その時も終幕……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, even that time must come to an end..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬の間の後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a brief pause,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声の主は女神ALICEに命じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the voice's master commands goddess ALICE.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女神よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Goddess,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方らの魂、妾の預かりとす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I shall take custody of these souls."
"Well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一つの可能性、その存在は知覚できた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One possibility, that existence has been perceived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この方らがまた集まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That these beings shall gather again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次なる命で何をする、か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and what they will do with their next lives..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最早、声の主には女神ALICEの姿など目に入らず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, the voice's master no longer even noticed goddess ALICE's figure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の考えに没頭していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fully absorbed in their own thoughts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「折を見て転生を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the right moment, reincarnation—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人なる種も良し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans are fine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな種の祖もまた良し……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or even the progenitors of new species are also acceptable..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上下反転のこの世界で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this upside-down world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声が深く深く、沈んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the voice sank deeper and deeper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この方ら、災禍の根源として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These beings, as the root of calamity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 輪廻の牢獄に捕らえようぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shall be trapped in the prison of samsara."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その体、幾度も朽ちらせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "May their bodies decay many times over,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その心、幾度も削り」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "may their hearts be worn away over and over."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「折を見て転生を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the right moment, reincarnation—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人なる種も良し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans are fine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな種の祖もまた良し……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or even the progenitors of new species are also acceptable..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上下反転のこの世界で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this upside-down world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声が深く深く、沈んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the voice sank deeper and deeper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この方ら、災禍の根源として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These beings, as the root of calamity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 輪廻の牢獄に捕らえようぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shall be trapped in the prison of samsara."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その体、幾度も朽ちらせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "May their bodies decay many times over,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その心、幾度も削り」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "may their hearts be worn away over and over."
